---
id: delete-user-memory-records
title: "Delete user memory records"
description: "This route allows you to delete your own memory records. You can either delete all memories at once or specify individual record IDs to delete.<br/><br/>**Note:** Deletion is asynchronous and may take time to complete. Deleted records might still appear in list requests briefly. If deletion fails for some records, the response will indicate which deletions failed."
sidebar_label: "Delete user memory records"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true

sidebar_class_name: "delete api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import Translate from "@docusaurus/Translate";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Delete user memory records"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/v1/memory"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to delete your own memory records. You can either delete all memories at once or specify individual record IDs to delete.<br/><br/>**Note:** Deletion is asynchronous and may take time to complete. Deleted records might still appear in list requests briefly. If deletion fails for some records, the response will indicate which deletions failed.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
>
  <Translate id="theme.openapi.request.title">Request</Translate>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","oneOf":[{"properties":{"deleteAll":{"type":"boolean","const":true,"description":"Set to true to delete all memory records"}},"required":["deleteAll"]},{"properties":{"recordIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"Array of memory record IDs to delete"}},"required":["recordIds"]}]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successfully initiated deletion","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"ok":{"const":true}},"required":["ok"]}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid request - must provide either deleteAll or recordIds","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"ok":{"const":false},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["ok","error"],"additionalProperties":false}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"ok":{"const":false},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"}},"required":["ok","error"],"additionalProperties":false}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
